amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Campus buildings and facilities; revenue bonds; proceeds; use.
amendatorysection.para: The proceeds of bonds provided for in sections 85-403 to 85-411, shall be used solely for the purpose for which they are issued and the expense of issuance of the revenue bonds in connection therewith.
